metadata.title: CVE-2020-24394 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel before 5.7.8, fs/nfsd/vfs.c (in the NFS server) can setincorrect permissions on new filesystem objects when the filesystem lacksACL support, aka CID-22cf8419f131. This occurs because the current umask isnot considered.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
